node.name: ArtMaker
node.description: ArtMaker is a flexible and customisable library that allows users to draw anything they want on screen and has been built fully with Jetpack Compose.

node.name: DroidConKE
node.description: This is an Android app for the annual Android Developer conference (DroidCon Kenya) held in Nairobi.  This project is the Android app for the conference. The app supports devices running Android 5.0+, and is optimised for phones and tablets of all shapes and sizes.

node.name: The-Self-Healing-AWS-Infrastructure
node.description: The Self Healing AWS Infrastructure is a Site Reliability Engineering [SRE]-based project. It consists of a Python Script and Terraform configuration which work together with an AWS EC2 Instance to "heal" the EC2 Instance during downtime by re-deploying it with the pre-existing configurations...
